prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that embodies mystery with a dark color palette and elegant features.
I want a psychic Pokemon with a humanoid shape and a striking black dress that captivates onlookers.
Generate a dual-type Pokemon that blends ghostly elegance with a touch of supernatural charm.
Make a Pokemon that stands tall and proud in a flowing gown, with unique hair resembling a starry night.
Imagine a psychic Pokemon adorned with bows and a mysterious aura that it uses to hypnotize its opponents.
Design a spooky yet stylish Pokemon that is both elegant and intimidating, perfect for a ghostly theme.
Give me a Pokemon that combines elements of elegance and haunting beauty, with a focus on dark and psychic powers.

distinctive_features: Black hair with large spiky elements
